topic.title: bug with connections limit
topic.body:
I got lots of this in logs:
DEBUG    FileServer Conn#45335 (IP) [?] > Closing connection: (IP) Connect error: IOError: cannot watch more than 1024 sockets in ConnectionServer.py line 142 > Connection.py line 107 > socket.py line 242 > core.pyx line 468 > core.pyx line 813, waiting_requests: 0, sites: 0, buff: 0...
Tray menu shows near the same value.
The actual problem is zn drops localhost connections too, so i can't access zites in the browser.
I think there must be exception for that, first of all, plus some logic limiting connections, probably related to a peer count on each site hosted.
// Yes, i have many zites connected.
